patthana16.40:4.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.40:4.3: Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa … pe … avigate pañcatiṃsa.
patthana16.40:5.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
